BUG TEMPLATE.text:
*Summary*
_Enter summary of the problem here._

*Steps to Reproduce*
_Enter detailed steps to reproduce here. More detail is better._

*Expected Behavior*
_Enter what should happen here._

*Additional Details*
_Enter any other details such as examples, links to requirements, et cetera that might help with fixing the problem. Attach screenshots if possible. More detail is better._

*Workaround*
_If there is a way to work around the problem, place that information here._

STORY TEMPLATE.text:
Story*
As a <_type of user/persona_>, I want <_to perform some task_>, so that I can <_achieve some goal/benefit/value_>.

*Details*
_Enter functional and non-functional needs here. More detail is better._

*Additional Information*
_Enter any other information such as examples, use cases, etc. that will help with developing the feature. More detail is better._

*Acceptance Criteria*
_Enter the conditions of satisfaction here. That is, the conditions that will satisfy the user/persona that the goal/benefit/value has been achieved._

NEW FEATURE TEMPLATE.text:
The Story issue type is preferred over the New Feature issue type.

Please consider using the Story issue type and writing a user story instead.

IMPROVEMENT TEMPLATE.text:
The Story issue type is preferred over the Improvement issue type.

Please consider using the Story issue type and writing a user story instead.
